jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description:
WHAT YOU’LL DO…
Logistics :
Ensure the company supply chain can meet the fast-growing demand. 
●	Providing demand forecasts and planning productions with our suppliers.
●	Manage inventories and coordonate stock at our different warehouses for maximum efficiency.
●	Ensure both B2C and B2B needs for products and delivery are met in a timely and cost-effective manner.
●	Continuous improvement of operational management systems, processes and best practices. Long term strategic implementation.
●	Processing and tracking of quotes, invoicing and other administrative duties as required.
Finance & Accountancy:
●	Managing budgets and forecasts and create relevant processes with the rest of the team.
●	Day-to-day liaison with our external Finance Consultant.
●	Create accurate and up-to-date reporting tools for the team and the investors.
●	Monitoring financial data and propose solutions for continuous improvement. Long term strategy. 
●	Managing our external bookkeeper and keep our accounting accurate and up-to-date. 
Human Resources :
Ensure the company hiring plans meet the business needs and be the guardian of company culture.
●	Providing the best possible office environment, maintaining the company culture and organising team-building events.
●	Planning staff needs and manage the recruitment process: job descriptions and person specifications, job adverts, application forms, shortlisting, interviewing and selecting candidates.
●	Managing new staff inductions and integration into the bigger team.
●	Administering payroll and maintaining employee records.
●	Developing HR planning strategies, for immediate and long-term staff requirements.
●	Strengthening the processes that have been implemented; enforcing policies and procedures.
Legal:
●	Helping the organisation’s processes remain legally compliant.
●	Managing our contracts, IP and general day-to-day interaction with our lawyers.

WHAT YOU’LL NEED…
You will have 2 to 4 years of previous experience in a similar position. We are looking for a good match for our team and someone who is keen to grow with more responsibilities. 
Our desired requirements are:
•	Great knowledge in organisational effectiveness and operations management, both in B2B and B2C businesses.
•	Experience in budgeting and forecasting.
•	Excellent at numbers and project management tools. Experience with Xero, Unleashed, Shipstation and associated softwares is appreciated, but Excel proficiency is a must.
•	Familiarity with business and finance principles.
•	Excellent communication skills, leadership ability.
•	Experience in recruitment.
•	BSc in Business Management or a relevant field.
•	A team player and an enthusiastic person, with an international outlook
•	Experience in the beauty industry would be a plus !
If your profile does not match our exact requirements above, please don’t hesitate to still send us your application.
